subject: Hi
body:
Hi
Greeting to you,
I have very good news for you, which is that your Cash Box that prevented entry into your country & was impounded by the Financial Task Force Authority. Meanwhile, I would like to introduce myself to you, My name is Ms. Katie Anderson. I wish to let you know that we were able to retrieve the consignment box from the Customs with the assistance of my contact person at Geneva.
The cash funds amounting to the sum $15Million was deposited with an International Security vault in Europe under your name being the beneficiary. Meanwhile, you are advised to get back to me immediately you receive this mail and forward to me your full contact information immediately.
This is to enable me to submit it to the Security vault for them to start processing to move your consignment directly to your doorstep. You can as well reach the Security vault and forward your contact information directly to them, they are already aware that you are the beneficiary of the said $15,000,000.00, marked with Serial Reference Code: presently deposited in their Security vault.
Please note that I had an understanding with this follower at Geneva, that you are to offer him 5% of the total money immediately the fund is moved into your account.
Awaiting your urgent response.
Mr. Evangeline Reynes.

subject: Re:   Hi
body:
Hello Mr. Evangeline Reynes,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. It sounds quite interesting, but I have a few questions before we proceed. Could you please provide me with more details about the Cash Box and why it was impounded by the Financial Task Force Authority? Also, how did you manage to retrieve it from Customs?

Additionally, I would like to know more about the Security vault in Europe where the cash funds are currently deposited under my name. Can you tell me which specific vault it is and how secure it is? I want to ensure that my funds will be safe throughout the process.

Lastly, you mentioned that I should contact your contact person at Geneva and offer them a portion of the total money once the fund is moved into my account. Could you please provide me with their contact information so that I can get in touch with them directly?

I appreciate your prompt response and look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Corinne

subject: HELLO MR. CORINNE. REPLY TO YOUR MAIL PLS. CONTACT THE SECURITY COMPANY. FROM MR. EVANGELINE REYNES.
body:
From: Mr. Evangeline Reynes.
262 Hermann St, San Francisco, CA 94117
California, USA
TEL: +1 (404) 282 2721.

Hi Corinne.

Greeting to you Sir,

I am in receipt of your mail. Content well noted. Honestly speaking sir, i
wish to inform you that I am a serious minded fellow who has no time for
frivolities hence this transaction is 100% real and will make a meaningful
impact in your life. Also Note that  it is NEVER my intention to deny you
this opportunity. I am a devoted christian and will gain nothing in doing
so, you should note that for the fact that others failing in a venture does
not warrant new people from succeeding in the same venture. A soldier does
not stop soldiering because of his dead colleagues but with a strong
 belief of victory irrespective of any odds against him.

Mr. Corinne. I will also like to introduce myself once more to you, my name
is Mr. Evangeline Reynes. working at the Financial Task Force Authority.
Like i told you that am writing to alert you of a consignment box dictated
to have containing some huge cash being either your inheritance payment
with contacts marked with batch number serial code the precipitant laying
unclaimed at the airport and was recently repatriated/deposited with an
International Security vault in Europe with the instruction to have it
delivered to your country.

Meanwhile in my first mail to you I told you your consignment has been
moved out to an Security Vault in Europe I will advise as a matter of
urgency you immediately contact the Security Company in United Kingdom and
let them know that you are the beneficiary of the sum $15Million marked
with *Serial Reference Code: CORINNE/EURO/V20/22,* presently deposited in
their Security vault. You can contact the person in-charges of the
Consignment with the below information:









*Europiir Logistics Ltd.Tallinn, United KingdomCONTACT PERSON NAME: Mr.
Graeme Wood.(Sales & Marketing Executive Director). ORMr. Jim
Anderson.(Head of Security Vault Resources)TEL: +44 7452 214721Fax:
+44-07087274397E-MAIL: euro@europiirlogistiltd.pw
<euro@europiirlogistiltd.pw>*

To be honest with you Mr. Corinne. This is real and legal. I have no bad
intention on you; rather, it is destiny that is about bringing us together
to achieve this goal for you and I believe it shall come to pass.

Awaiting your immediate response.

Yours sincerely,
Mr. Evangeline Reynes.

subject: Re: HELLO MR. CORINNE. REPLY TO YOUR MAIL PLS. CONTACT THE SECURITY COMPANY. FROM MR. EVANGELINE REYNES.
body:
Hello Mr. Evangeline Reynes,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your email and the information you have shared with me. It's interesting to hear about this opportunity involving a box of cash that is supposedly marked with my name.

I understand that you mentioned the box has been moved to a security vault in Europe. Could you please provide me with more details about how this came about? How did my name become associated with this box of cash?

Also, could you clarify why the box was initially left unclaimed at the airport? It seems unusual for such a valuable item to be abandoned like that.

Lastly, I would like to know more about Europiir Logistics United and their role in all of this. What is their reputation and how can I be sure that they are a trustworthy company?

Thank you again for contacting me, Mr. Reynes. I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Corinne

subject: Re: HELLO MR. CORINNE. REPLY TO YOUR MAIL PLS. CONTACT THE SECURITY COMPANY. FROM MR. EVANGELINE REYNES.
body:
Hello Mr. Evangeline Reynes,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your email and the information you have shared with me. It's interesting to hear about this opportunity involving a box of cash that is supposedly marked with my name.

I must admit, though, that I am a bit cautious when it comes to such matters. Can you please provide me with more details about how this cash ended up in the airport and why it was moved to a security vault in Europe? I want to make sure I fully understand the situation before taking any further steps.

Additionally, could you clarify what exactly my role would be in this process? How would I go about contacting the Security Company in the United Kingdom? And what are the next steps if I decide to proceed?

Thank you for your understanding, and I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Corinne
